name: Infiltration (itch) (MepHiii)
description:
In this 2D pixel-art puzzle game you control Agents Red and Blue on an infiltration mission. A mysterious device will prove vital for success. 

Disclaimer

This game was made during my first ever game jam, Brackeys Jam 2020.2. All of the art, sound effects, music and code was made by myself.

Special Thanks

Thank you to James, Heather and Mel for playtesting my game.
